website_summaries.verdict: A durable steel spare tire carrier that keeps your tire secure and resists corrosion.
cons: A few users have said that the included bolts were too short

customer_reviews.title: Pretty stout mount
customer_reviews.text: Welds look good, I would guess they were done robotically, as they are very uniform. Made of 3/16" or 1/4" steel. Mounting brackets will not work on 5" frame rails. I planned on mounting mine like my pictures show anyway, so it worked out great for me.
customer_reviews.author: average joe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and finish. Just wish they used lugs instead of carriage bolts to mount the spare. Not a deal-breaker, I just bought a small 4-way to keep with my towing supplies.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, put two of em on my utility/camping trailer bolted together.. one holds the spare tire and the other holds a propane tank bracket thanks to a 1ft piece of 2x3 steel tube. etched the zinc with oven cleaner then painted the whole setup black to match my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: nayr

customer_reviews.title: Needs better bolts to carry the spare tire
customer_reviews.text: The bolts that came with this bracket were not suitable to hold the spare tire for the trailer. The carriage bolts were too short and the nuts were not suited to tighten down like lug nuts. I bought some studs from NAPA and used those to mount the spare. With that exception, the carrier bracket was easy to mount and well made. We have made the first trip with the spare mounted and everything worked well.
customer_reviews.author: A T Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product and comes complete with all needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product and comes complete with all needed hardware. Doesn't fit my spare wheel bolt pattern exactly but I was still able to secure tire on it, just not fully flush fitting on one bolt holding the tire rim to the frame bracket.
customer_reviews.author: paul murphy

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 5 X 5 wheels
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made bracket but it does not, let me repeat that, IT DOES NOT, fit a 15 inch wheel that has a 5 bolt pattern and has 5 inch spacing. It would fit a 4.5 inch spacing but will not fit a 5 inch spacing. I had to take a file, and an hour, and elongate the bolt slots to stretch them enough to use on my 5X5 wheel.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install - Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This spare carrier came with all parts ready to install on my boat trailer and installed in about 20 minutes with ease. All welds were tight and even and seems very durable. This got my spare up off the frame deck where I had to crawl under the boat to remove the nuts should I need my spare. It's configured to accept either 4 or 5-hole rims. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kardy

customer_reviews.title: Spare Tire Carrier in the Bed of My Ford F150
customer_reviews.text: From the male side of the family -- this worked great for my older Ford F150 truck. I wanted to mount the spare tire in the pickup bed (on the frame, against the cab window). I had to drill a few holes in the sheet-metal, and work things around a bit to get it to fit. I was able to bolt it down firmly and get the tire and rim bolted on. The carrier is strongly made and works well. You might have to do a little finagling to get it to fit your vehicle. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Family

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Sturdy Tire Holder
customer_reviews.text: This is my second tire holder for a jet ski. I installed the first one a couple weeks ago and the tongue on that jet ski was short so installing the holder was more difficult then the one I am installing in on now. Very nice tire holder for the price. Very good quality and strong.
customer_reviews.author: BDP

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product And Don't Throw Away Your Old Hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding spare tire mount. The mounting hardware was not long enough for my application (back of a bumper pull Rv) so I used the existing U-bolts and with a little bending the U-bolts matched up to the mounting holes and the Spare Tire Carrier was mounted in less than 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Blah.
customer_reviews.text: So, this thing sucks in that the piece that holds the tire and the brace in the back are not the same sizes. The piece holding the tire that is supposed to marry with the brace is shorter than the brace. So if you have a 4 to 5" width trailer hitch, this will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: TheEvan

customer_reviews.title: Very stout and a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This bolted right up to my Carry All 10x5.5 aluminum trailer. Was one of the cheaper options on Amazon yet it was very sturdy and appears to be very well made. For what it does I don't see how the higher priced unites could be any better.
customer_reviews.author: flyin-lowe

customer_reviews.title: sturdy tire carrier & easy install
customer_reviews.text: Works great. In my case I had to move my trailer jack on the opposite side because the tire would of been in the way of the wench. Was very simple adjustment and easy installation. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chad R.

customer_reviews.title: It’s good but it could be great
customer_reviews.text: I like the design but I’m still trying to figure out why you can’t put a five lug on 5 inch hole on the left-hand side so this can be used by more people you’re limiting your product doing it this way
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Bolts
customer_reviews.text: It comes with fasteners but I purchased grade 8 fasteners for added strength. I also added a 2" x 6" steel spacer for wheel clearance and the tongue clearance on my dolly. Check your wheel backspacing. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Shirley C.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked to see washers for the bolts. Was glad to see additional size bolts for smaller frames. Wheel mount holes don’t seem to line up quite right but still holds tire.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer hitch for small trailers.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, variety of bolts accomodating for various thicknesses of trailer frame. Just installed so only time will tell if the galvanized finish holds up. But so far I cannot be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: mrmruns

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I searched very carefully to find a good quality tire holder thingy. I looked through many reviews and picked this one. I am pretty confident with my choice. It came today and is pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Usfull
customer_reviews.text: bolts on the trailer fine. But the sorry type of washer for the lug bolts for the spare tire to bolt onto is CHEAP, and extremely difficult to screw on. Better bring a back-up wrench when trying to unbolt the spare tire.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Walters

customer_reviews.title: damaged thread first time tightening the wheel in place
customer_reviews.text: I am use to tight bolts and nuts and didn't feel I was over torque. Either I have gained power or the bolts are soft steel. the rest of the carrier is fine. Found new identical bolts in SS in home depot.
customer_reviews.author: Laouenan D.

customer_reviews.title: Check extension needed from boat.
customer_reviews.text: Depending on your boat trailer you may not be able to use this. On mine I had to change the position 5 times until the tire would not hit the boat. The extension should be 2 or 3 inches longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, sturdy, and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on a boat trailer, the whole job including mounting the tire onto it probably took less than 20 minutes. Feels sturdy and looks pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit triton trailer spare tire
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit a 215 60/8 spare tire. The weld is very poor as well. I hope when i return this it doesnt get passed on to another customer
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to buy extra hardware
customer_reviews.text: Like that it was easy to install once you replace the hardware with a shoulder less bolt don’t care for the wheel studs retainer they are cheap and don’t hold the studs so you have to reach around to hold them but other than that great product
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, but does not fit smaller tires
customer_reviews.text: So I guess this is on me. I purchased this for an 8 inch rim and spare tire for my snowmobile trailer. Love the look and is built well. However, this does not fit my 8 inch rim. I'm going to keep the product and modify it to fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Manns

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was easy with Prime. Was pleasantly surprised at the obvious quality. Only flaw is the lack of a built in locking provision - which is not unusual for these.
customer_reviews.author: BENJAMIN J TARTAGLIA JR

customer_reviews.title: Great spare time mount.
customer_reviews.text: This spare tire holder takes the place of one that we cut off of the trailer because it was a belly mount that was always dragging on the ground, boat ramp, and driveway. This one is awesome and the trailer looks better with it mounted on it. Great buy...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this item. The quality seems good. I just installed it on my trailer and all the hardware was of good solid material. Hopefully it doesn't rust to quickly. The only down side is the carriage bolts for mounting the tire are super short. I stopped at the local hardware and got some 3" bolts. Much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Spare tire mount for trailer is important , when you do a lot of traveling to fish.
customer_reviews.text: The added peace of mind in having a spare on your boat trailer is priceless. I found this unit to be well made, easy to install and at a great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Coplin SR

customer_reviews.title: Guess fit involves more ten just four or five bolt pattern.
customer_reviews.text: Well It should fit nice after I use some kind of grinder to take 1/4" off all four edges (see picture) But otherwise seems well made. Edit: Cut the corners off and everything fits great now. Upgraded the review to 4 stars; just make sure you've got a decent angle-grinder before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Brennon Haag

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my load rite 1000lb trailer. Very adjustable. Wish that tire bolt holding thing a majegy worked better. But other than that very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: mike shukaitis

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Was too small for my needs (my bad - measure twice!) That being said, I found it to be a well made product. Someone got a great deal at my yard sale.
customer_reviews.author: nocknock@pacbell.net

customer_reviews.title: Spare tire anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quantity considering the low cost. Works perfect to carry a spare on my boat. Simple to install.
customer_reviews.author: B-MAN

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what we needed and is versatile in where and how you can mount the spare on trailer.
customer_reviews.author: rbb333

customer_reviews.title: Very solid product with easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I had to install a 2x4 as a spacer because of the design of my trailer. This product is super sturdy and well built. Took about 10 minutes to install. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Good quality spare tire mount.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. Worked great on my utility trailer to mount a 15" spare tire. I was concerned about getting a spare tire mount because I though that there may no be enough ground clearance to mount the tire where I wanted it - this mount worked fine. It has not rusted yet, so I am very happy with it. I would recommend this spare tire mount.
customer_reviews.author: Philip A Covington

customer_reviews.title: Just as ordered
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the quality and fit. I painted it to match my boat trailer. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Solution!
customer_reviews.text: This spare tire mounting bracket does a very good job of holding a 4.80 X 12.00 tire and holds it away from the mounting surface by 2 inches. This worked especially well in my situation where I needed that distance to clear an angle iron frame member. Sturdy and well built in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Ridinfree

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money....
customer_reviews.text: If you have a larger trailer (tandem 6 lug) I had to do a little drilling & welding to make it usable. Great start to a easy project.
customer_reviews.author: Monte

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a good product but unfortunately it didn’t offset my spare tire for my boat enough for me to install properly.
customer_reviews.author: Meriah Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice product, no complaints about it. Looked good and decent craftsmanship. Installed on a aluminum trailer just fine. Wish I would have gotten it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: CNS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but tire mount plate is a touch large
customer_reviews.text: The mount plate hits on my mounted tire rim so I had to buy additional bolts to add as a spacer between the plate and the rim. Works great just beware you might have to purchase 4 more bolts from home depot, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Wenger

customer_reviews.title: For such a simple piece of equipment, there are ...
customer_reviews.text: For such a simple piece of equipment, there are many ways to screw it up. Thankfully, this product got it right. It's very heavy duty in gauge and welding. Fit the trailer and 5x4.5 bolt pattern spare perfectly. Angle of the arm keeps tire well away from the ground. Comes with two sizes of bolts to work with trailer beams of different thicknesses.
customer_reviews.author: shonji

customer_reviews.title: very rugged unit
customer_reviews.text: I wish the bolts would be the same 1/2X20 as the axle bolts on the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: sawadee

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: holds the spare and very sturdy. I bought another for my 2nd spare
customer_reviews.author: Tammy And Ralph

customer_reviews.title: High quality spare tire carrier.
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty spare tire mount that has no movement out on the road. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JLins

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expect
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my trailer and fits perfect. Different holes and bolts to make sure it can mount on any trailer. Great price and quality
customer_reviews.author: kyle g

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly for snowmobile trailers
customer_reviews.text: Good product but too shallow for snowmobile trailer tires. You can make it work by adding spacers. I gave it 3 stars because it advertised as if all trailer tires would fit.
customer_reviews.author: albert w.

customer_reviews.title: easy to mount.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to mount most anywhere you want on a trailer. Good and stroung and looks good
customer_reviews.author: Dwight D Jones

customer_reviews.title: Holds spare tire
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on trailer and attach tire to it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Weld broke lost my spare tire.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for 2018 &2019 season. I went to take the boat out the first tome for the 2020 season only to discover that my $120 spare tire and part of the holder was missing. The u shaped weld had failed. Now I’m out $120 plus the $25 I spent on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Zach VanSwol

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, flexible installation options
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made, worked great on my sledbed to mount a spare upfront.
customer_reviews.author: SavageMN

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a decent product and I installed on my trailer ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a decent product and I installed on my trailer but the directions aren't that good so you have to figure things out for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Added to a Trailer
customer_reviews.text: Husband used them to hold a spare tire on his utility trailer, good quality for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Raeann Klouse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Was able to put on the boat trailer with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Kuszmaul

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Never get caught without a spare! This is a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mount! Only thing is make sure you have a 3/4 socket on hand to get it off!
customer_reviews.author: Danel Werth

customer_reviews.title: It looks well made and sturdy. However
customer_reviews.text: It looks well made and sturdy. However, it does work with my trailer tire which has an eight inch rim. It could work with a larger one. In addition, not sure how you can lock the tire if it is pared with a large wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because the lock rings it comes with is difficult to use with the correct bolts. Works great and holds well but the rings were a pain
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: didnt fit my spare tire
customer_reviews.text: did not fit my 5 hole trailer tire like a half a hole off
customer_reviews.author: ray852

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrier
customer_reviews.text: Installed in 10 minutes and fit right up. Looks strong with good welds.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to the trailer for my 20' Ocean Scout
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the trailer for my 20' Ocean Scout. Gets the tire up out of the way of the road. A bit tricky to mount the tire because you have to hold the bolts and the tire while putting the nut on...so it's not quick but once on there it's perfect piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Drinnt

customer_reviews.title: This product does everything I thought it would. After ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does everything I thought it would. After I mounted this on my boat trailer and installed the spare tire on it I looked with admiration at a job well done.
customer_reviews.author: LAW74

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: A great product and good value. Half the cost of others and just as good. Save your money paying more doesn’t equate to being a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy intsall
customer_reviews.text: Very great product that mounts well to my trailer for the spare tire. easy instructions let you get it on in under five minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: if fit my rim it would have been great
customer_reviews.text: didn't fix my snowmobile trailer tire/rim. The depth of my rim inside is 4+ inches and the tire width didn't allow me to attach the tire to the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered but didn’t read enough and it doesn’t fit a 6 bolt pattern, but I will say it is well built and I wouldn’t be concerned to hang it and a tire on a trailer. Very well bult
customer_reviews.author: NHG

customer_reviews.title: Worth more. Were is the 6th star when you need one?
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Gave me option for mounting on frame or 4” sq tube bumper
customer_reviews.author: Paul Garwood

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 8 inch rims.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it does not fit 8 inch rims. I had to cut the mounting plate in order for it to fit. No big deal for me because I have a shop and the tools. I like the product and have ordered another for my 13 inch rimmed trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No problem! Would buy again. It's been on several months now!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed SCSC

customer_reviews.title: This is just what we needed and now we can ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we needed and now we can travel without worries about where to carry the spare for our tow dolly.
customer_reviews.author: grannylee923

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: well made. and looks good fit right on my boat trailer
customer_reviews.author: Mark Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as described. Very well built, easy to install, sturdy, and great value. I wish the the bolts to hold the wheel were fine thread instead of coarse thread, so they would accept wheel locks.
customer_reviews.author: Onliner

customer_reviews.title: Extra holes for nothing.  Stupid.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit. The long pieces are big enough but the big piece is way too short. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Now I'm prepared in the event of a flat or blowout.
customer_reviews.text: Needed to add a spare to my boat trailer. Took only a few minutes to secure this and mount the tire. Now I'm prepared in the event of a flat or blowout.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur B Disney

customer_reviews.title: Is a nice price and seems well made but
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the boat trailer. Is a nice price and seems well made but, I had to buy longer bolts to make it fit on my "Magic Tilt" trailer. Once placed it holds the spare perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: E. B. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck but hardware not the best had to make a trip to the hardware store to replace unthreaded bolt.
customer_reviews.author: karenchenoa

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to install, good quality. It's been holding our trailer spare tire for many miles with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Plaskon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well to mount spare tire on boat trailer. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: TSTS

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: This was a quick install for a spare tire on a boat trailer and made well
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than expected. I was able to install in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: rwaite91

customer_reviews.title: it did not fit my channel bumper on my RV ...
customer_reviews.text: it did not fit my channel bumper on my RV. Had to send it back and get a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Fair&Honest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to install and is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: G H

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a decent product just installed today. Easy to install only took about a half hour. I'm happy with the purchase a long as it holds up. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: SHOP BOSS

customer_reviews.title: Poorly welded
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not obtained with this product. Some of the worst welds I have seen. Will not be trusting it to hold up over time and keep my spare safe. Email sent to company. Will be returning to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: may be a little akward to install by yourself
customer_reviews.text: mount spare tire and rim on a trailer frame. good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a different spare tire holder and I am sure glad cause it is so much easier to use. Mounts easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Overall a superior product!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and fit my five hole wheel perfectly. Only small issue was difficulty in putting retaining washers on the bolts but overall a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Nut busting
customer_reviews.text: Holds my tire. Not if.i would stop loosing my nuts
customer_reviews.author: renpeg

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It works for me! I have a small trailer and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall good quality. Check your measurements of your trailer frame though, I had to switch parts from one I had on a utility trailer to get to work, but that's my fault for not pre measuring.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: WELDS SNAPPED OFF, LOST SPARE AND CREATES A VERY DANGEROUS SITUATION
customer_reviews.text: AS PEOPLE HAVE MENTIONED, THE WELDS ARE POOR AND THEY SNAPPED SOMEWHERE ON MY TRAVELS WHEEL GONE, POSSIBLY ON THE HIGHWAY? BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice spare tire holder. Bolted right up to my jet ski trailer. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Delikat

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in minutes. 5 hole spare tire fit perfect no problems at all. I would give this item 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Shane miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit.  Heavy enough for any spare.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bolted right on, I put it on the opposite side of my trailer winch handle. And had to move my jack forward a bit, but it works nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bugle M Ranch

customer_reviews.title: ... to mount this under the trailer frame and work great with additional support of uninstruct
customer_reviews.text: I was able to mount this under the trailer frame and work great with additional support of uninstruct..
customer_reviews.author: Spence

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount. Does not vibrate or shake when driving. Would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Muller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Easy to install. Now I don't have to keep loading and unloading my trailer spare tire in the back of the truck
customer_reviews.author: JACK

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as expected. Bolted it on but have not really "used" it yet. Seems sturdy and capable of holding the spare tire as stated.
customer_reviews.author: doityourself

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with Extreme Max spare tire mount.
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described. Mounted easily, is very solid construction, and has a sturdy connection to trailer. Included two sets of mounting bolts to fit different size trailer frames.
customer_reviews.author: whatever

product_meta.title: Extreme Max 3004.4553 Economy Spare Tire Carrier
feature_bullets: Heavy-duty, welded, reinforced zinc-plated steel construction
Fits 4 hole rims with 4" bolt circle patterns and 5 hole rims with 4. 5" bolt circles
Designed for front or mid-trailer mounting
Easy-to-install bolt-on design - No cutting or drilling
All mounting hardware included - Two-year replacement
